name: Chitin Invasion
description:
You are a cosmic centipede and you need to eat every villager before they become too advanced.

Warning: unfinished and unoptimized game, I got sick during the game jam and ran out of time.

General controls

  • Left Mouse Button to move
  • M to open the map (if unlocked)
  • P to pause
  • F to toggle fullscreen

Villager controls

  • Left Mouse Button to move/attack/pick up
  • Right Mouse Button or X to drop
  • C to open the crafting menu

Saving islands on web

Make sure to not have more than 5 saved games at the same time or the next ones will probably fail to save.

Consider deleting previous saves or playing the desktop version that supports unlimited saves.

If you are using private browsing the game won't work properly!

Known bugs and limitations (spoilers!)

  • The centipede head can get stuck in rivers (hardlock!)
  • The villagers can't climb
  • The villagers almost never use the tools they craft
  • The villagers sometimes get stuck near water
  • The centipede AI is not implemented if you play as a villager
  • Backpacks and fishing rods are not implemented
  • The auto-tiling can sometimes fail to render near rivers and mountains
  • Loading the save of a finished game will crash the game
